keyMoments.title: Dr. Kobato's Debut
keyMoments.description: Dr. Kobato appears for the first time as a pediatrician at G-8 Marine Base who cannot handle the sight of blood.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a character who will help showcase Chopper's medical abilities and compassionate nature.

keyMoments.title: Faints at Sight of Blood
keyMoments.description: Dr. Kobato faints when injured Marines arrive for emergency surgery, unable to handle the sight of blood or suffering.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes her weakness and creates the necessity for Chopper to take over medical operations.

keyMoments.title: Protects Chopper from Drake
keyMoments.description: Dr. Kobato forbids Drake from entering the medical wing, protecting Chopper and Nami from discovery.
keyMoments.significance: Shows her gratitude to Chopper and her growth in standing up to authority despite being timid.

relationships.description: Dr. Kobato is helped by Chopper during emergency surgeries and shows gratitude by protecting him from the Marines.

evolutionMoments.description: Chopper helps Dr. Kobato perform emergency surgeries when she faints at the sight of blood.

reveals.information: Cannot handle the sight of blood or suffering despite being a doctor
Works as a pediatrician at G-8 Marine Base

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Chopper Smuggled into Medical Wing
keyMoments.description: Chopper hides in a box of medical supplies and is carried into the medical wing of G-8.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up Chopper's opportunity to showcase his medical expertise while undercover.

keyMoments.title: Chopper Disguises as Doctor
keyMoments.description: Chopper takes over medical operations and disguises himself to direct treatment of injured Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's medical expertise and compassionate nature, treating even enemies.

keyMoments.title: Completes Emergency Surgeries
keyMoments.description: Chopper successfully completes all emergency operations, saving the wounded Marines before shrinking to normal size.
keyMoments.significance: Proves Chopper's competence as a doctor and his commitment to saving lives regardless of allegiance.

relationships.description: Chopper helps Dr. Kobato overcome her fear and perform emergency surgeries.

evolutionMoments.description: Chopper assists Dr. Kobato during emergency surgeries at G-8.

relationships.description: Nami assists Chopper as a nurse during the emergency surgeries.

evolutionMoments.description: Nami and Chopper work together in the G-8 medical wing.

keyMoments.title: Zoro Taken to Prison
keyMoments.description: Zoro is escorted to the prison cells and ordered to be interrogated by Lieutenant Commander Drake.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the interrogation subplot and demonstrates Marine intelligence-gathering attempts.

keyMoments.title: Truthful but Unbelievable Answer
keyMoments.description: Zoro truthfully tells Drake they came from heaven via an octopus balloon, but isn't believed.
keyMoments.significance: Comedic moment showing how absurd the Sky Island adventure sounds to outsiders.
keyMoments.quote: We came from heaven via an octopus balloon.

keyMoments.title: Deduces Chopper's Presence
keyMoments.description: Zoro correctly deduces that the mysterious doctor performing surgeries is Chopper.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's knowledge of each other's skills and abilities.

keyMoments.title: Assigned as Nurse
keyMoments.description: Nami is dragged to the infirmary in a nurse uniform to assist with emergency medical procedures.
keyMoments.significance: Brings Nami and Chopper together, demonstrating crew teamwork under pressure.

keyMoments.title: Cutting Onions with Sanji
keyMoments.description: Luffy is assigned to cut three hundred onions with Sanji but keeps fooling around instead of working.
keyMoments.significance: Comedic subplot showing Luffy's inability to focus on mundane tasks.

keyMoments.title: Distracted by Jessica
keyMoments.description: Sanji is assigned to cut onions with Luffy but is distracted by his attraction to Jessica.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's characteristic weakness for beautiful women interfering with his mission.

keyMoments.title: Orders Zoro's Interrogation
keyMoments.description: Jonathan orders Lieutenant Commander Drake to interrogate Zoro about the Straw Hats' infiltration.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Jonathan's strategic approach to dealing with the Straw Hat Pirates.
keyMoments.quote: Interrogate the prisoner. Find out how many crew members there are and how they infiltrated the stronghold.

keyMoments.title: Interrogates Zoro
keyMoments.description: Drake interrogates Zoro about how the Straw Hats infiltrated G-8, but doesn't believe Zoro's truthful answer.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Marines' attempts to understand the pirates' methods.

keyMoments.title: Investigates Mysterious Doctor
keyMoments.description: Drake learns about an unidentified doctor performing surgeries and suspects a Straw Hat Pirate.
keyMoments.significance: Raises the stakes for Chopper and Nami's situation.

keyMoments.title: Blocked by Dr. Kobato
keyMoments.description: Drake attempts to investigate the medical wing but is forbidden entry by Dr. Kobato.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Dr. Kobato's protection of Chopper despite the risk.

keyMoments.title: Assigns Onion Cutting
keyMoments.description: Jessica assigns Luffy and Sanji to cut three hundred onions in the kitchen.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a comedic subplot and keeps two Straw Hats occupied.
keyMoments.quote: Are you finished with the onions yet? I want you to cut the next three hundred onions.
